message.body: Hello!
Hey, I've been in training all day and this is my first chance to check messages
Weather too good to be cooped up inside!
But my allergies are insane!! Argh tree pollen how I hate you
Yeah it's beautiful out! Almost like fall this morning. Allergies are terrible though
My eyes have been very itchy and red the past few days
How was training?
It's weird how my allergies change intensity from year to year
Great, they had a speaker from Wharton talking about negotiation. He was terrific but scary!
Haha! Being a good negotiator can be be really useful!
He gave us real life case studies and we had to negotiate the case in front of the class
I was Lou Gerstner from IBM trying to take over Lotus then announcing the takeover to the Lotus employees
It was so hard! Then we got critiqued in front of the class
There was an art opening in the lobby of our building, it was nice to grab a snack and glass of wine and look at some art on the way home
What was the art
Paintings/drawings that they hung up a few weeks ago, abstract
I'm always feel like I'm not smart enough to "get" abstract art
I think it once was a statement against the status quo, but now it sort of lost its meaning ... Not to be dismissive of a whole genre
And i think it's just about taste, if you like the way it looks then great but "trying it figure it out" is just based on if you see anything in it
I guess I'm looking for it to provoke some emotional response in me
If it feels too intellectual it's just a turnoff
Yeah i think that's true for most people, some people pretend to like it because they don't wamt to look like they "don't get it" ... Much better to admi
t what you actually like
Taking the dog to the park, time to enjoy some of this nice weather!
Yay! That's my evening plan too
